projects.title: Brerzerk
projects.blurb: STERN'S 1980 arcade classic remade with Pixi.js

projects.title: About WebGL
projects.blurb: Here is an introductory presentation I gave on WebGL (without using any libraries!) see the video at vimeo.com/69136718

projects.title: Quadtree Visualization
projects.blurb: An experiment with an optimisation system for a bunch of moving things (particles)

projects.title: TapSynth
projects.blurb: I built an iOS App from concept to App store in 2 months. TapSynth puts an exclamation mark on a year and a half of Objective-C study. Site design by Danielle Primiceri.

projects.title: Introduction to Backbone.js
projects.blurb: A presentation at UPenn; showing off the power of Backbone.js

projects.title: CG Effects Reel
projects.blurb: My visual effects reel, including personal and commercial works from the past 8 years. Software skills include Maya, After Effects and Real Flow.

projects.title: Pasta Sauce for Cats
projects.blurb: I wrote, designed and animated this piece. Lovingly dedicated to Squeegee. Made with Maya, Shake & Photoshop.

three_sketches.title: NYT's Most Popular
three_sketches.blurb: This web app uses data from NYTimes.com search API to display the most popular topics. Built with Three.js and jQuery.

three_sketches.title: Tunnels
three_sketches.blurb: An art + code experiement with generated geometry, point lights and a flying camera

three_sketches.title: Wireframe Globe
three_sketches.blurb: Another experiement, this one an homage to the graphics of 'War Games' ca. 1984

three_sketches.title: A Golden Head
three_sketches.blurb: Environment reflections and bump maps help sell this head model as gold

d3_sketches.title: Popularity of JS Frameworks
d3_sketches.blurb: Wondering which Javascript framework is the most talked about on Stack Overflow? Data from May 2014

d3_sketches.title: Snack Nutrition Graph
d3_sketches.blurb: A fun graph of nutrition information for the snacks at my office. It's sortable, click the boxes in the key at the bottom.
